title: Supporting Jews Isn’t Hard, Progressives | Guest: John Cooper | 5/25/21
description:
Actor Mark Ruffalo apologized for claiming that Israel is committing genocide, but his fellow progressives aren’t happy. Why is it so hard for progressives to show the same support for Jews as they do for other minorities? Pat Gray joins to discuss Beto O’Rourke possibly running for governor of Texas and the origin of COVID-19. John Cooper, lead singer of Skillet, joins to review his new book, “Awake & Alive To Truth,” and the “false religion” of critical race theory that’s being taught even in our churches. Biden just purged the U.S. Commission of Fine Arts. Glenn reviews the horrors taking place in Chinese concentration camps against the Uyghurs. The cryptocurrency market is dropping, but is Elon Musk or China to blame?
